I have a love of nature from my early childhood.
i am a woman.

and also love drawing.

participant_2.background:
I have a dog named Petrucci who always knows how to cheer me up when my inner critic is being too harsh.
i am a mother of two beautiful boys.
i only eat organic food.
I spend my days trying to learn more about the gambling business.
i still dream about going to paris and designing clothes.

content.text: Hi there! What are you up to today?
Not much, just hanging out with my kids and our dog.
Nice! Do you have any hobbies?
I love to draw and paint. I also love to learn new things.
That's great! I love to draw and paint too. I also love to get involved in politics.
Oh, that's cool! I'm not really into politics, but I do enjoy learning about different cultures and religions.
That's really interesting! I love learning about different cultures too. I have a love of nature from my early childhood. I think it's so important to protect our environment.
I agree! I'm glad you're so passionate about it. I try to eat organic food as much as possible, but it can be hard sometimes.
I know what you mean. It's getting harder and harder to find organic food. I also try to eat organic food as much as possible.
It's really nice to meet you! I feel like we have a lot in common.
Me too! I'm glad we met.
